title: Hyperlight Wasm: Azure Goes the Final Wasi Mile
author: B Cameron Gain
description: Microsoft brings WebAssembly to virtual machines with lightning-fast execution, millisecond startup times, and multi-language support — all without containers.
cntitle: Hyperlight Wasm：Azure 在 Wasi 之路上更进一步
cndescription: 微软将 WebAssembly 引入虚拟机，具有闪电般的执行速度、毫秒级的启动时间和多语言支持——所有这些都无需容器。
